verbose_text: Exogenous application of SA induces the biosynthesis of coumarins in Matricaria chamomilla [XREF_BIBR], taxane in Taxus chinensis [XREF_BIBR], saponins in ginseng [XREF_BIBR], phenolic acids in Salvia miltiorrhiza [XREF_BIBR], artemisinin in Artemisia annua [XREF_BIBR], and sinapyl alcohol in ulmus cells [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: SA induces the biosynthesis of coumarins
